location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.1250 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Kemball’s previous letter (folio 161) concerning the settlement between the inhabitants of Aboothabee [Abu Dhabi] and Foweyrat [Fuwairat]. Anderson writes that news of the settlement is ‘very satisfactory.’
